member.bio:
A psychologist and independent developer, blending positive psychology, Chinese wisdom, and AI to create meaningful change. 
With a deep belief that â€œCreating happiness is like earning moneyâ€; 
He is passionate about empowering individuals and fostering well-being through innovative tools and insights. 
His latest work, Kuakua.app, is a platform dedicated to spreading positivity and psychological wisdom to improve lives globally.
